name: Default Changelog
description: A beautiful changelog template for ShipShipShip
author: ShipShipShip

settings.label: Display Newsletter
settings.description: Show newsletter subscription form on the public page

categories.label: Upcoming
categories.description: Events currently in development. These will be displayed in the 'In Progress' section.

categories.label: Released
categories.description: Events that have been completed and published. These appear in the main changelog timeline.

categories.label: Proposed
categories.description: Events here will be displayed in the vote card where users can vote on upcoming features.

categories.label: Feedback
categories.description: User feedback and suggestions. This is the status where submitted feedback is added.
